remarks: If ` A ` is an isolated point in ` X ` (or equivalently, the singleton ` { A } ` is open in ` X ` ), then every function is continuous at ` A ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2015.)
statement: cnpdis $p |- ( ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ K e. ( TopOn ` Y ) /\ A e. X ) /\ { A } e. J ) -> ( ( J CnP K ) ` A ) = ( Y ^m X ) ) $.
